p:
Estimation of future viruses and vaccination: patterns of change were observed for the human R and M types in each of the PC axes (Figs.Â 2A,B, 3A, and S4A). Although PCA produces sin curves for the records of random walk mutations
6 , the real patterns may reflect some rules in the drift of genomes. As patterns of M groups become apparent, we can compare them between M and R viruses to estimate the hidden rules.
